title: FS 1910-12 Sweet Caporal Pin Bobby Wallace, HOF, EX
author: Northviewcats

posts.post_title: FS 1910-12 Sweet Caporal Pin Bobby Wallace, HOF, EX
posts.post_content:
Hello Everyone,

I have this 1910-12 Sweet Caporal Pin #145a Bobby Wallace, HOF, for sale. Pin is in excellent condition. There is no dents, scratches, rust, or tobacco stains on the front of the pin. There is some staining on the paper advertising on the back of the pin that makes the back look blurry.

Price: $34.95

Shipping: Please add $3.50 to cover the shipping.

Payment: Paypal (f/f please), check, or money order are all acceptable.

First response with a commitment to purchase gets the card.

Thanks for looking,

Joe
